channel.title: Bataan Memorial Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Bataan Memorial Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-70 West/I-25 Junction
item.description: US-70 west to I-25 ramp. Use left lane for I-25 south to El Paso; use right lane for I-25 north to Albuquerque.

item.title: US-70 West at I-25
item.description: US-70 west at I-25 to Albuquerque and El Paso. Continue west on US-70 towards Las Cruces.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching I-25
item.description: US-70 west approaching I-25 to El Paso and Albuquerque. Continue west on US-70 for Las Cruces.

item.title: US-70 West - Roadrunner Parkway IC
item.description: US-70 west at Roadrunner Parkway/Del Rey Blvd. interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Rinconada IC
item.description: US-70 west at Rinconada interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Sonoma Ranch IC
item.description: US-70 west at Sonoma Ranch Blvd. Interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Mesa Grande IC
item.description: US-70 west - Mesa Grande Dr. interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Porter IC
item.description: US-70 west at Porter Drive interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Holman IC
item.description: US-70 west at Holman Road/Dunn Drive interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Weisner IC
item.description: US-70 west at Weisner Road interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Brahman IC
item.description: US-70 west Brahman Road interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - NASA IC
item.description: US-70 west at NASA Road/Baylor Canyon Road interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Entering Lower Rio Grande Watershed
item.description: Entering the Rio Grande Watershed on US-70 west. The Rio Grande flows into the Gulf of Mexico.

item.title: US-70 West - Missile Range IC
item.description: US-70 west at Missile Range Headquarters/HTA interchange.

item.title: US-70 West Approaching White Sands IC
item.description: US-70 west approaching White Sands Missile Range interchange.

item.title: US-70 West - Bataan Memorial Highway
item.description: US-70 west - Bataan Memorial Highway. US-70 between Las Cruces and Alamogordo is designated as the Bataan Memorial Highway.

item.title: US-70 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-70 west. Distance to White Sands Missile Range and Las Cruces.

item.title: US-70 West - Holloman AFB Main Gate IC
item.description: US-70 west approaching Holloman AFB Main Gate interchange. US-70 continues west towards Las Cruces.

item.title: US-70 West - Holloman AFB IC
item.description: US-70 west approaching Holloman AFB Main Gate interchange. US-70 continues west towards Las Cruces.

item.title: US-70 West - White Sands Missile Range Warning
item.description: Warning on US-70 west leaving Alamogordo: When flashing US-70 closed ahead. Expect one hour delay.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South at Split
item.description: US-70 West/US-54 South at US-70/US-54 split.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South at US-70 West
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West (Relief Route) at US-70 West exit to Las Cruces.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West - US-70/US-54 Split
item.description: US-70/US-54 Split on US-70 West/US-54 South (Alamogordo Relief Route). Use left lanes for US-54 south to El Paso.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South - Relief Route
item.description: US-70 West/US-54 South - Alamogordo Relief Route.
